europeana:record.dc:title: Plagiolepis obscuriscapa Santschi, 1923, a junior synonym of Plagiolepis pygmaea (Latreille, 1798) (Hymenoptera: Formicidae: Formicinae) and the use of pigmentation as discriminating character in ant taxonomy
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Boer P.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Insecta
Formicidae
Formicinae
Plagiolepis obscuriscapa
Plagiolepis pygmaea
pigmentation
taxonomy
synonyms
europeana:record.dc:description: The synonymy of Plagiolepis obscuriscapa Santschi, 1923 with P. pygmaea (Latreille, 1798) is proposed. The use of pigmentation as only discriminating character in ant taxonomy is criticised.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: Plagiolepis obscuriscapa Santschi, 1923, a junior synonym of Plagiolepis pygmaea (Latreille, 1798) (Hymenoptera: Formicidae: Formicinae) and the use of pigmentation as discriminating character in ant taxonomy (URN:ISSN:0024-0672) (Volume 82) (Issue 43)
